title: Referee Costs Real Madrid?
description:
The FC crew take a look back at numerous referee and VAR errors this weekend including multiple decisions in Real Madrid's draw with Girona. Plus, the guys preview Napoli's visit to Liverpool, question if Spurs can get a result in a tough environment in Marseille and react to Lionel Messi being linked with a move to Inter Miami after this season.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: A look back at numerous refereeing errors this weekend; Klopp fires back at Liverpool slump; Messi linked with Inter Miami
